210 Bowery, (store front only) west side, between Spring and Prince
Streets.

(2)

723360f-a.title: Manhattan: Spring Street - Bowery
723360f-a.text:
Spring Street (center), west from the Bowery (across the foreground) as viewed from the former Libby's Hotel on Delancey Street between Chrystie and Forsyth Streets. The building with the flagpole atop, is the Commonwealth Bank, No. 190 Bowery,and is at the N.W. corner. No. 2 shows a more extensive view of Bowery roof tops.
February 14, 1930.
P. L. Sperr.

723360f-b.title: Manhattan: Spring Street - Bowery
723360f-b.text:
Spring Street (center), west from the Bowery (across the foreground) as viewed from the former Libby's Hotel on Delancey Street between Chrystie and Forsyth Streets. The building with the flagpole atop, is the Commonwealth Bank, No. 190 Bowery,and is at the N.W. corner. No. 2 shows a more extensive view of Bowery roof tops.
February 14, 1930.
P. L. Sperr.

716781f-b.title: Manhattan: Bowery - Spring Street
716781f-b.text:
(1)
Bowery, west side, north from but not including Spring Street. The Bowery Branch of the Y. M. C. A. is shown at Nos. 222226 Bowery, south of the S.W. corner of Prince Street.
May 9, 1934.
P. L. Sperr.
(2)
The same, slightly northward.
May 9, 1934.
P. L. Sperr.  NNEG ~ 049
(3) The same, as No. 1 and showing a frontal view of buildings.
February 24, 1933.
P. L. Sperr.
